casebody.data:
Monday, March 2, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

98-207. Tanzi v. Nahigian.

Cuyahoga App. No. 71872. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, granted, pending further order of this court.
